TEI.2.document_title: Adam Beatty to Stephen F Austin, 10-16-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: Adam Beatty to Austin, Washington, Ky., October 16, 1832. Asking Austin to keep an eye on his son. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 877
